div.p: Curia tenta per ballivos in pretorio sexta die nouembris anno et cetera lxxv

quo die
Robertus burnat conuictus per assisam adiudicatur in amerciamento pro perturbacione Eliza
beth sponse Duncanj lammynton' in verbo et emendabit prout Jura volunt
Et in partem emende dabit dimidium libre cere ad missam sancti sanguinis

Eodem die dictus Robertus burnat inuenit Jacobum Kintor plegium legalem de
indempnitate Duncanj lammyntoune aliter quam per viam Juris Et similiter Willelmus modan
devenit plegius legalis pro Duncano lammynton ut supra et cetera

In curia ballivorum tenta in pretorio xo die nouembris anno quo supra Subscripti
electi fuerunt in Inquisicionem videlicet Alexander de camera de murchil Johannes de mar
Dauid colison gilbertus vaus alexander rede Willelmus hay Dauid mathoson
Edmundus lowson gilbertus leich Walterus blindsel alexander rolland alexander
blindsel Johannes de tulidef

the same day the actione movit and dependand betuix Androw smyth and alan
smyth anent the land liand In'In' overwrites '&'. futy and of ij s' of annuel is Resplatit be
the aldirman balyeis and consel quhil this day xv dais in siclike fourme
as it is In now withoute preiudice of ony party. And in the meyntyme
the said parties has consentit tochese certane personys tose gif thai
can accorde apon the said debatis thai nocht beand oblist tostande
til thare decrete forthir than thai can accorde thaim . And gif thai
can accorde thaim in the meyn tyme as said is thai ar oblist
to stand til thare deliuerens. And failyeand tharof tocum to the law
again this day xv dais as said is
Curia ballivorum tenta xxiiijto die nouembris anno et cetera lxxv

quo die Isabella
soror Johannis potmakar et Elizabeth affidata ut asserit dicti Johannis ipsarum
quelibet amerciatur pro perturbacione adinuicem prout compertum fuit per assisam . et emendabit
altera alteri prout Jura volunt

the said day it is ordanit be the aldirman and consel that . gif it beis fundin in tym
tocum . that the forsaid Elizabeth . mak ony sic strublans of the said Johne
potmakar of forfautis in contrar' of him as scho has done . that scho salbe
crovnyt oute of this toune for hir trespas et cetera

In Curia legali ballivorum tenta in pretorio xxvijo die novembris anno predicto secta
vocata et curia affirmata absentes patent in rotulo secte

Quo die actio mota per Rogerum seres contra fynlaum fores super clameo
v coronarum cum consensu eorundem summittitur ad determinacionem et deliberacionem thome
mar thome scrogis et Willelmi cadiou pro parte dicti rogeri et thome fif et Johannis
chapman in via castri pro dicto fynlao et deficientibus aliquibus seu aliquo
dictarum personarum ad eligendum consimiles personas finiend' dictum clameum per
sua Juramenta hodie post merediem

patricius androson conuictus per assisam pro perturbacione thome bawne amerciatur / et dictus
thomas similiter in amerciamento pro perturbacione dicti patricij / verbo et cetera

Eodem die Dauid crukschank secundo die vocatus ad sectam gilberti morison ad liberandum
eundem de ix li' Non comparuit / Et ideo precipitur seriando capere districtum et cetera . et ad premuniendum
ipsum ad proximam curiam legalem tanquam ad tercium diem processus
Curia ballivorum tenta in pretorio prima die Decembris anno et cetera lxxv

quo die Willelmus card
nach famulus Johannis lammyntoune et cristinus carnifex conuicti per assisam pro perturbacione
adinuicem ipsorum quilibet amerciatur et emendabit alter altri prout Jura volunt

Eodem die Dauid mathoson porrexit plegium super alexandrum rede de iniusta detencione
x li' et xvj s' ab eodem ad bonum compotum . qui quidem alexander peciit diem legalem
ad respondendum dicto plegio . vnde ballivi assignarunt eidem diem lune ad octo dies proximo
venturo videlicet xj diem instantis mensis

Die quarta Decembris Andreas philpson conuictus per assisam adiudicatur in amerciamento pro
percussione et perturbacione vxoris henrici phi poilson et emendabit prout tenetur

Eodem die Dauid gethan et alexander bonetmakar conuicti per assisam ipsorum quilibet
amerciatur pro perturbacione adinuicem et emendabit alter altri prout Jura volunt / Et
in parte emende dictus alexander dabit j li' cere ad missam sancti sanguinis / plegius legalis
pro David gethan / Andreas scot et Alexandro trail pro alexandro bonetmakar de indempnitate et cetera

Matheus cowpar adiudicatur in amerciamento pro iniusta porrectione plegij super Johannem Wormot
de vna barella salmonum de qua dictus Johannes cepit se exonerari per probacionem thome
mar quod idem thomas probauit mediate suo Juramento secundum tenorem acti inde confecti

The same day . Johne androson Johne the vaus and thom of mar on the ta part
and Johne of ruthirfurd on the tothir part . ar appointit and accordit before the
aldirman and bailyes sittand in Jugement . tocompere this day viij dais peremp
tourly til vndirly the decisione determinacione and deliuerens of the best and wour
thiast personis that may be gottin for the tyme anent the clame of twa
barellis of salmond made be the said Johne of ruthirfurd . tobe endit the
said day as day peremptour without ony excepcione or langar delay

Eodem die fergusius blithe amerciatur pro iniusta detencione vij s' et iiij d' a Duncano
byrs prout deliberatum fuit per assisam et satisfaciet eidem infra terminum Juris

Item eodem die Willelmus rettre coram ballivis protribunali sedentibus constituit andream
rettre filium suum et heredem apparentem suum procuratorem ad prosequendum et optinendum
vnam barellam salmonum debitam sibi per Dauid spens et in quibuscumque aliis causis
ipsum concernentibus Et promisit de Rato cum ceteris procuratorij clausulis necessariis et oportunis

Item eodem die Willelmus moyses coram ballivis fatebatur se debere alexandro trail
vj s' viij d' et tenetur satisfacere infra terminum Juris

Curia legalis tenta per ballivos xjo die Decembris anno prescripto quo die secta
vocata et curia affirmata absentes patent in rotulo secte

the same day the process' followit be gilbert morison apon Dauy cruk
schank of ix li' the quhilk sould haf beyn callit this day as the third
day of process' is delayit with consent of the said gilbert at the instans
of androw scherar' . vnto the law day eftir yule next tocum in the same
fourme and effect as it is in now withoute preiudice of party

the same day the assise has deliuerit anent the clame that Johne of ruthirfurd
has til Johne androson Johne the vause and thom of mar of twa barellis of
salmond / that gif thom of mar wil swere that the twa barellis war nocht put
vndir the owyrlop of the schip . the said Johne of ruthirfurd is qwyte of the
clame of thaim . And gif he Refusis toswere the forsaidis personis ar dettouris
to the said Johne topay him the said twa barellis of salmond within lachful
tyme as merchandis sould do til vthir'

Item the same day Duncan of sanquhar' of murcroft forspekar for Allan smyth
strekit a borch in the hand of Duncan of straloch ane of the seriandis that sen
Allan smyth is and has beyn in possessione of a certane land liand in futy cla
mit be androw smyth yere and day peissably and vndemawndit the ayris or
clamaris beand at lachful age and within the kynrik that thai aucht
nocht tobe herd thareftir in the clame of the said land

Item the said day incontinent James cummyn forspekar til androw smyth Recoun
terit the said borch strekit be Duncan of sanquhar sayand that the said
Allan smyth was nocht in peissabil possessione of the said land but throu rycht
of his wif quhilk was hirris for the tyme and be vthiris resonis
quhilkis he had toschaw heireftir And for waiknes of court the balye
is continewit the warde and decisione of the said borch and Recounter quhil
friday next tocum et cetera
Curia ballivorum tenta in pretorio xvto die Decembris anno Domini et cetera lxxv .

quo die
decretum fuit et wardatum per curiam quod plegium porrectum alias per Duncanum
sanquhar de murcroft prelocutorem Allani smyth contra et aduersus Jacobum cummyn
prelocutorem Andree smyth non fuit alicuius valitudinis roboris uel momenti Et Recon
trariacio eiusdem valoris est

Actio mota et dependens inter Alanum smyth et andream smyth penes quandam terram
iacentem in li futy clamatam per dictum andream et penes possessionem eiusdem cum consensu
parcium continuatur vsque ad diem legalem post festum natalis Domini proximo futoro
sine preiudicio cuiuscumque partis / Et quod illa die dicte partes secum portent munimenta et
documenta de et super dicta terra secundum quod desuper voluerint deseruiri

Eodem die Alexander rede prelocutor Willelmi mathei filij quondam Johannis mathei
tunc presentis et in manu sua existentis . solempniter protestatus fuit quod quicquid
annuj Redditus de illa terra quam nunc inhabitat et occupat Dauid
mathei auunculus dicti Willelmi de terminis transactis et futuris de terminis et non solutis
non cedat dicto Willelmo in aliquod preiudicium in futurum / ex quo dictus Dauid
mathei occupat huiusmodi terram . vsque ad perfectam etatem dicti Willelmi / attento
et considerato . quod dicta terra est satis distringibilis et cetera

The xx day of December before the aldirman and balyeis sittand in Jugement
Androw lammyntoune grauntit him tobe awand til Johne Wormot xvj s'
for the price of twa bollis of malt and twa stane of talch tobe pait til him
on the behalue of his modir failyeand of hir payment

the same day Dauid spens comperand before the balyeis in plain court
gravntit him topay til William of Rettre a hamburgh barel of salt
salmond within xv dais next tocum . togiddir with a new schete weyand
iij li' and demi withoute langar delay

Eodem die andreas lammyntoune adiudicatur in amerciamento curie pro iniusta detencione iij s' et viij d'
a gilberto vaus prout deliberatum fuit per assisam et cetera

Johannes skynnar conuictus per assisam amerciatur pro perturbacione cuiusdam Donaldi ruralis et emen
dabit parti lese prout Jura volunt / Et similiter amerciatur pro perturbacione Jacobi crag
thomas gardnar et thomas gled pistores ipsorum quilibet in amerciamento pro perturbacione adinuicem in verbo

Johannes skynnar deuenit plegius legalis pro thoma gardnar de indempnitate thome baxtar
aliter quam per viam Juris Et thomas baxtar inuenit alexandrum trail plegium ut supra
Andreas lammyntoune amerciatur pro iniusta vendicione correorum alexandri trail et cetera
Curia tenta per balliuos xxijo die Decembris /

quo die Willelmus cadiou per concessionem propriam
amerciatur pro perturbacione Johannis Wellis et dictus Johannes quitus per assisam ./ que quidem assisa ordi
nauit / quod quis eorum alteri primo taliter offendat et desuper conuictus fuerit soluet ad
lumen beati nicholai iij li' cere / plegius legalis pro dicto Johanne thomas prat et
thomas mar pro dicto Willelmo de indempnitate et cetera

The same day thom prat Dauid Kyntor thom of mar and alexander scrogis arbitrouris
chosyn and sworne betuix Nicol baxtar and Johne gray with consent of thaim baith
decretit and deliuerit before the aldirman and bailyeis in plain court / that the said
Johne gray sal content and pay the said Nicol within lachful tyme xx s'
and x d'

Item the said day . the aldirman and balyeis chargit thom of mar todepone be
his aith . anent the twa barellis of salmond clamit be Johne of ruthirfurd eftir
the tenour of the deliuerens of the assise / the quhilk aith the said thomas Refusit
to swere

The same day / Duncan of straloch ane of the seriandis at the command of the aldirman and
balyeis layd wand on William quelp chargeand him that he sould Remain and
nocht pas furth oute of the tolbuthe vnto the tyme that he devodit and red
ane chavmer til Dauid mathoson as tutour til Willy mathoson and pait him of
xl s' of mail aucht for the said chavmer of termis bigane eftir the tenour of the
act made tharupon of before et cetera

Die penultima Decembris anno et cetera lxxv Andreas scherar inuenit Thomam prat
plegium legalem de indempnitate Jacobi cummyn aliter quam per viam Juris Et similiter
Dauid mathoson plegium pro dicto Jacobi de indempnitate eiusdem andree ut supra
Curia tenta per ballivos die secunda Januarij

quo die Johannes cathkyn conuictus
per assisam amerciatur pro perturbacione Roberti cowpar

Johannes scot in amerciamento per concessionem propriam pro perturbacione Jonete Dis' et eadem Joneta amerciatur
quia perturbavit dictum Johannem prout compertum fuit per assisam

Eodem die quidam Hans nauta posuit se in voluntate ballivorum pro perturbacione et
lesione Ade hervy et ideo in amerciamento et emendabit parti lese prout Jura volunt

The ferd day of Januare the yer' of god M iiijC lxxv . Alexander menyes than beand
aldirman with consent and avise of the consale of the quhilk part of the names eftir
folowis . has deliuerit and concludit . that becaus' . Waltir blindsel was admittit
and in the lettre of assedacion . vndir the common seil of this burgh . til haue had ane
half nettis fisching of the wattir of the fuyrdis . for sik termis as nychtbouris and vthiris
and wrangwisly was haldin tharefra as notourly was knavin in the tyme /
the forsaidis aldirman and counsel has promittit . that the said Walter blindsel . sal haue
yerly . to the Ische of the last assedacione . twa markis of the vsual money
of scotland . tobe pait til him and til his assignais And at the next setting of
watteris eftir that the termis of the last assedacion . be runnyn /. the said Walter sal
haue ane bettir tak at the avise of the counsale and settaris of the Wattiris
in that tym . for sicklike mail and gressom as nychtbour and vthiris payis eftir the tenour and
fourme of the next assedacion . to be made / And thir ar the names of part
of thaim that war present in the tyme /. Alexander of chavmer of murchil androw scherare
Johne of mar Dauid colison Dauid lesly / gilbert the vaus Johne the vaus
Johne Wormot Dauy mathoson Wil blindsel eldar and yungar and vthiris sindri et cetera

Curia Capitalis burgi de aberdene tenta in pretorio per ballivos eiusdem octauo die Janua
rij Anno Domini et cetera lxxvto quo die secta vocata et curia affirmata absentes
patent in rotulo secte

Eodem die actio mota inter Andream smyth actorem ab vna et Alanum smyth reum
ex altra partibus Respectuatur cum consensu parcium sub spe concordie in statu quo
nunc est vsque ad diem veneris proximo futuro videlicet diem xij instantis mensis pro certis
aliis aris causis in curia motis et dependentibus absque preiudicio parcium predictarum

Item eodem die Dauid crukschank tercio die vocatus per Johannem vaus seriandum responsurum
gilberto morison pro liberacione eiusdem gilberti de ix li' Non comparuit Quare
precipitur sergeando capere districtum et cetera et ad premuniendum eundem ad proximam diem legalem et cetera

Johannes gray porrexit plegium super Nicholaum baxtar de iniusta detencione iiijor li' ad
bonum compotum et idem Nicolaus peciit diem legalem vnde Jacobus cummyn balliuus
assignauit eidem ut asseruit diem veneris proximo futuro ad peremptorie respondendum dicto plegio

the same day . ser Androw seras summond' at the instans of thomas of chavmer be my lord of
Aberdeins lettres . has deponit be his aith . In the first that yone land . liand at
the castelgate hede quhilk the said thomas folowit be process' ath til hym
the annuel of xxx yeris bygane Item he has deponit . that quhen William scherar'
was aldirman ./ at the instans of the said ser androw with consent of the consale . he Rais'
wp with a certane of the consale and Johne gray ane of the balyeis / and gaf the said
thomas of chavmer possession of the said land in the name of the toune

Item the said ser androw has gevin til the said thomas of chavmer his rychtis of that
annual bygane and for tocum . that he has / had or may haf . for all the daies
of his life in part of payment for the labour of balyery that the said thomas has
of the said ser androw et cetera
